title: Why Canadian scientific innovation depends on global health partnerships
desc: Canadian scientific innovation delivers real impact only when global health systems are funded and engaged as partners, not sidelined.

title: Massive Undersea Volcanism May Explain Frequent Extinctions in Triassic Period
desc: A team of geologists from China and Australia has found evidence that episodic eruptions from vast marine large igneous provinces (LIPs) drove repeated lower-order extinction events in the Triassic period.

title: Organic salmon certifier forced to share findings amid claims consumers misled
desc: Information tribunal rules Soil Association must disclose salmon farm inspection reports to WildFish campaigners

title: 'I deserved the 2025 Ballon d'Or' - Raphinha
desc: Months after the 2025 Ballon d’Or ceremony crowned Ousmane Dembélé as the world’s best player following his treble-winning season with Paris Saint-Germain, Raphinha has reopened the debate.

title: Democratic Sen. Amy Klobuchar announces run for Minnesota governor
desc: Amy Klobuchar says she's running for governor of Minnesota. The Democratic senator is promising to take on President Donald Trump’s administration and unify the state.

title: ‘The LED of heating’: cheap geothermal energy system makes US comeback

title: EU considers entry ban on Russian soldiers who fought in Ukraine
desc: "There can be no path from Bucha to Brussels," the Estonian foreign minister said as he called for an EU-wide entry ban on former Russian soldiers.
